column4: a lil help guys? I'm tryn to use winetricks it downloads just great 100% but then i get this all the time sha1sum mismatch! whats up?
this means that the file is damaged
redownloading may also fix this.. the file on your computer is damaged not the one on the server

just in case you want to know :) .. the problem you are having can happen if either your internet connection is not funtioning properly or if the program that is downloading the file makes any mistakes/errors
